meanings.definition: Something added or to be added, especially a supplement to a book.
meanings.sent1: The professor included several addenda at the end of the textbook to provide extra information.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy reading the addenda in a book because they often contain interesting facts.
meanings.sent3: The addenda in the cookbook included bonus recipes for desserts.
meanings.sent4: Her notes were like addenda, enhancing the main text with additional insights.
meanings.sent5: The addenda in the manual were highlighted in bright colors for easy reference.

meanings.definition: Additional items or material added at the end of a book or other publication.
meanings.sent1: The librarian carefully inserted the addenda into the back of the novel.
meanings.sent2: The addenda included a list of references for further reading.
meanings.sent3: The addenda in the magazine were filled with fun puzzles and games.
meanings.sent4: The addenda acted as a treasure trove of extra information for curious readers.
meanings.sent5: The addenda were like hidden gems waiting to be discovered by attentive readers.
